summary: LA police captain attempts to appease Sunset Strip businessmen objecting to hippy youths hanging out, by setting a curfew. The cop also thinks the kids have a right to be there, until his estranged daughter joins the counter-culture crowd.
cast: Aldo Ray|Mimsy Farmer|Michael Evans|Laurie Mock|Tim Rooney|Bill Baldwin|Anna Strasberg|Hortense Petra|Schuyler Hayden|Gene Kirkwood|Pat Renella|Forrest Lewis|George E. Carey|John Hart|Dick Winslow|Tony Benson|Frank Alesia|Jim Lefebvre|Margaretta Ramsey|Harry Stanton|John Lodge|Norman Bartold|Marianne Osborne|Patrick Hawley|Deborah Travis|The Standells|The Chocolate Watchband|The Enemies|Tim Abbott|David Aguilar|Gary Andrijasevich|George Bruggeman|Dick Cherney|Dick Dodd|Al Ferrara|John Fleckenstein|Bill Flores|Rudy Germane|Gary Lane|Mark Loomis|Danny Phay|Larry Tamblyn|Sean Tolby|Tony Valentino|Cory Wells
title: Infierno en Sunset Street
